checkboxInputMode.description: Brief explanation for input mode checkbox

titleCheckboxInputMode.message: Replace the calculate (↪) button by pressing the enter key ⏎. This is more convenient but less intuitive. A further disadvantage is that it is not possible to break an expression over several lines and that the size of the field cannot be adjusted with the mouse.
titleCheckboxInputMode.description: Verbose explanation for input mode checkbox in popup and on option page

inputSize.description: Brief explanation for size (60:1 default) in input field

titleInputSize.message: The size (“width:height”) of new input fields and the width for non-resizable fields. If “height” (or “:height”) is 0 or omitted, it defaults to 1; if “width” is 0 or omitted, it defaults to 60. The value can be changed by putting 'width:height' somewhere on the input line.
titleInputSize.description: Verbose explanation for size in popup and on option page

inputBase.description: Brief explanation for output base (2-36) in input field

titleInputBase.message: The number base (2-36) which is used for the output of the resulting numbers. Any other value than 2-36 means that the usual basis 10 is used and that the additional output of the basis itself is omitted.
titleInputBase.description: Verbose explanation for output base (2-36) in popup and on option page

textClearStorage.message: This clears all stored data of the extension and resets all options to their defaults
textClearStorage.description: Verbose explanation to clear storage button

textLinkOpen.description: Link for opening a new session

textInline.description: Text explaining inline option modifiers (should be short)

announceLast.description: Announcement of symbol for last result

textLast.description: Announcement of symbol for last result

buttonClipboard.description: Button to copy last result to clipboard anew

buttonAllClipboard.description: Button to copy the whole session to clipboard

buttonAddSession.description: Button to add the stored session

buttonClearStored.description: Button to clear the stored session

buttonClear.description: Button to clear the current session

textResult.description: Substituting text if no result button is used. Should not be empty for clarity

messageResult.description: output specified result in specified base

errorBadSingleQuote.message: syntax error in 'input area size' specification

errorNoLast.message: cannot use “#” (yet): there was no last result
errorNoLast.description: error for using non-existent last result #

errorUnresolvableFunction.message: function “$NAME$” cannot be resolved. Possibly missing braces
errorUnresolvableFunction.description: error for specified unresolvable function, probably due to missing braces

errorAssignNonVariable.message: attempt to assign a value to a non-variable
errorAssignNonVariable.description: error for an attempt to assign to a non-variable

errorCallNonFunction.description: error for an attempt to call a non-function

errorParse.description: error for an unspecified parse error
